duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide advanced HR operational, strategic, program, and compliance support for corporate and small business clients.
Administer leaves of absence, ensuring compliance with federal, state, and local laws.
Advise clients on building robust and well-suited business and human resource policies.
Analyze, plan, and advise on management related to leave administration and HR consulting.
Manage payroll processing, preferably using ADP.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field required. (SHRM-CP preferred)
